## ğŸš€ Installation

### Installer
1. Download `Flowmora Browser Setup.exe`
2. Run and follow the wizard
3. Launch from Desktop or Start Menu

### Portable
1. Download `Flowmora-Browser-win-x64.zip`
2. Extract to desired location
3. Run `Flowmora Browser.exe`
